Pre-Game Insights: Óscar Villegas will take charge of his first game as the team's manager and will look to begin his reign on a positive note.
Yangel Herrera was ruled out of the meetings against Bolivia and Uruguay due to a thigh injury and Jesús Bueno was added to the squad as his replacement.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The stadium is located at an altitude of over 4,150 meters, which should work in Bolivia's favor.
Venezuela have won four of their last five meetings against Bolivia, scoring 17 goals.
Others: Bolivia will entertain Venezuela at Estadio Municipal de El Alto in the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers on Thursday.
The visitors enjoyed a good run in the Copa America and won all three group-stage games.
